page.title: 13Clubs.
page.content: It is a wonderful reflection upon the caring attitude of many of the adults in Newport, that so many clubs are available for the community. The youngest children attend the Brownies, which is run with much good humour.Older children have the opportunity to join the Girls Brigade or the Boys Brigade.Both these clubs organise a variety of sporting and educational activities. Teenagers have the opportunity to join the Youth Club where they meet to listen and dance to music, play snooker, table tennis and other interesting pursuits. Newport is a keen sporting village, having a successful football club and a newly formed cricket club.The local pubs also support enthusiastic darts teams, who have raised money for local charities.
